downloadTitle: Microsoft Word 97 Outlook Message Class Document
downloadDescription: Omsgclas.doc is a Word document that uses Office automation to change the message class for all items in an Outlook folder.
detailsSection: You can get specific information about this document in the Microsoft Knowledge Base article How to use the Omsgclas.doc Word document to automatically change the message class of Outlook items.
systemRequirementsSection: Outlook 97, Outlook 98, or Outlook 2000 with Word 97 or Word 2000.
installInstructionSection:
Download and run the self-extracting EXE file. The extracted Word document contains additional instructions.

See the Microsoft Knowledge Base article How to use the Omsgclas.doc Word document to automatically change the message class of Outlook items for more information about using the Word document.
